bioconda.name: pyfastx
bioconda.summary: pyfastx is a python module for fast random access to sequences from plain and gzipped FASTA/Q file.

biocontainers.name: pyfastx
biocontainers.summary: A robust python module for fast random access to sequences from plain and gzipped FASTA/Q file

biotools.summary:
The pyfastx is a lightweight Python C extension that enables users to randomly access to sequences from plain and gzipped FASTA Q files.

All tools support for random access were used to perform benchmark.

bioschemas.name: pyfastx
bioschemas.summary:
The pyfastx is a lightweight Python C extension that enables users to randomly access to sequences from plain and gzipped FASTA Q files.

All tools support for random access were used to perform benchmark.
